title: Hardware Startup
abstract: Discovering how an early-stage, high-growth tech company works.
blogContent:
I’m in NY.

I'm in a hardware startup.

I’m discovering what entrepreneurship is. The kind you see in series like this:


I’ll be here for three months. Here’s a taste of the projects I’ll be doing:

    Creating an awesome customer support service.
  • Chasing the founder around for a week.
  • Adding a physical presence to an digital platform.
  • Understanding how to raise capital.
  • Discovering what a great team is made of.

I’ll be updating this blog section bi-weekly, documenting everything I learn!

Stay tuned...
